> The diff coverage is `100%`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/15812/graphs/tree.svg?width=650&height=150&src=pr&token=eZ4WkYLtcO)](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/15812?src=pr&el=tree)

```diff
==========================================

==========================================

==========================================
+ Hits        44956    44960       +4     
- Misses       4447     4458      +11
```

> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/15812?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [1dab800...e6e4971](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/15812?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

thanks @ucals I pushed a more generalized soln to your branch.

This is actually a big area have been meaning to fix. There are quite a lot of subtleties w.r.t. numpy (and pandas) coercions.
ok ping on green. (note if you feel up to adding more test cases to ``pandas/tests/types/test_cast.py`` go for it (could also be a follow).

thanks @ucals 

as I said if you want to add some followup tests, pls do.
